shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 2ra-119vc) I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fols. 3ra-4ra) I-2) Introductory exhortation and hymns (fols. 4ra-5rc) I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki ... "I worship Thee ..." (fol. 5rc-vb) I-4a) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 8 miracles (fols. 5v-11rb) I-4b) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 100 miracles (fols. 12ra-119vc)
Additiones 1-2.

copyists.copyist: Ḫaylä Mäsqäl is mentioned as a scribe on fol. 20vb; his name is written over erasure in hand a.

donors.donor: According to Additio 1 (written in hand b), the Ms. was commissioned by Gäbrä Krǝstos. He and his family members are mentioned in supplication formulas throughout Text I-4b. Their names were partly erased and at the beginning of the text replaced (in hand a) with that of Zä-Giyorgis and his family members. Zä-Giyorgis is also mentioned throughout Text I-4a.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. was rebound. Many fols. damaged by water. Fol. 1, of different size and colour, might have been added later. Fol. 115 is reinforced with parchment guards. Single leaves foliated as 120 and 121 were added later and are hold together with parchment strips. Fol. 122 is mutilated. Holes or tears amended on fols. 57, 78, 94, 95, 113.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with deep-vermillion tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the deep-vermillion leather cover (7 tools were used: fourfold line fillet, interlaced line fillet, double circle, small x, cross hatching, double sine wave with dots, wave form).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

txfolios.txfolio: (122+60a). Foliation mistake: number 60 is given twice.

squires.squire:
A(1; s.l.: 1, stub before 1/fol. 1r-v) – <I(10/fols. 2r-11v)> – ፩II(8/fols. 12r-19v) – ፪III(8/fols. 20r-27v) – ፫IV(8/fols. 28r-35v) – ፬V(8/fols. 36r-43v) – ፭VI(8/fols. 44r-51v) – ፮VII(8/fols. 52r-59v) – ፯VIII(8/fols. 60r-66v) –፰XI(8/fols. 67r-74v) – ፱X(8/fols. 75r-82v) – ፲XI(8/fols. 83r-90v) – ፲፩XII(8/fols. 91r-98v) – ፲፪XIII(8/fols. 99r-106v) – ፲፫XIV(9; s.l.: 9, stub before 1/fols. 107r-115v) – XV(7; s.l.: 2, stub after stub of 3; 3, stub after 4; 4, stub after 3; {5, 6}/fols. 116r-122v).
Quire I has probably been added later. Two single leaves have been inserted later into quite XV.

taunit.mr-info: Fols. 2ra-11rb: all data are for fol. 3r.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Fols. 12ra-119vc: all data are for fol. 13r.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Fols. 120ra-121vc: all data are for fol. 121v.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: fine and careful. Hand b: mediocre.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: fols. 2ra-11rb. Regular script, with slender letters. Hand b: fols. 12ra-119vc. Tall, irregularly formed and right-sloping letters with short hairlines; ancient form of numeral ፮ (looking like "compressed" numeral ፯).

rubrications.rubrication: Name of St. Mary; name of the donors; groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-4b; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections of most of the texts and partly section numbers of Text I-4b; elements of the punctuation signs and the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: Throughout Text II: ሰ፡ ለ፡ for ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-1 is followed by the short hymn: Sälam läki ḫoḫǝtä mǝśraq ... "Salutation to you, Threshold of the East..." (fol. 4ra).
Text I-2 includes the hymns: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam dǝngǝl wäladitä ʾamlak ... "O my Lady, Virgin Mary, Godbearing ..." (fol. 4vc) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bä-kǝlʾe Maryam Mariham ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus kähali ... "Salutation to you, o my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus the Almighty ..." (fols. 4vc-5ra) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bä-kǝlʾe Maryam wäladitä ʾamlak ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn wä-ʾǝmmä bǝrhan ... "Salutation to you, o my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary, Godbearing, Mother of the Saviour and Mother of the Light ..." (fol. 5ra-rc).
The last miracle of Text I-4b is followed by a text (fol. 118vc-119vc) beginning with: ስምዑኬ፡ ኦውሉደ፡ ብርሃን፡ ማኀበረ፡ ቅድስት፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ዘደብረ፡ አቡነ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ በእዝነ፡ ልቡና፡ ወነጽሩ፡ በአይነ፡ መንፈስ፡ ክሙ፡ ኀበ፡ ተአምራሃ፡ ለእግዝእትነ፡ ... "Listen, o children of the light, of the holy congregation, church of ʾabunä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus to the miracles of our lady with your ears of comprehension and eyes of spirit ..."

additional.cont: Fol. 119vc: Note on the commissioning of the writing.
additional.det: The note, written in hand b, states that ʾazmač Gäbrä Krǝstos commissioned the writing.

additional.cont: Fols. 120ra-121vc: Fragment of a collection of Marian hymns (?)
additional.det: The text contains the hymn: sälam läki dägǝmit Sämay... "Salutation to you, Second Heaven..." (Cp. ChRep no. 98). The scribe disregarded the ruled lines after the first folio and wrote in a small, tight and uneven script.

extras.extra: - Tämälläs-sign indicating the place where the omission, written in the margin, belongs: fol. 3rb. - Scribbles: fol. 11rb.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Quire marks (partly decorated) are written in the left upper corner, on fols. 12r: ፩ (written four times, in all corners), 20r: ፪, 28r: ፫, 36r: ፬, 44r: ፭, 52r: ፮, 60r: ፯, 67r: ፰, 75r: ፱, 83r: ፲, 91r: ፲፩, 99r: ፲፪, 107r: ፲፫.
